name: Flame 'N' Fizzle
description:
Submission to 8th MMArmelade GameJam.
Thank you Isa & Sina!
Flames 'n' Fizzle is a game with two slimes connected through a bond thicker than blood. They are scared of water.

Credits:

3D: Lena Schibany, Jana Schimak, Thomas Schmidt
Audio: Adelheid Eisl
Programming: Niels Hovorka, Joakim Misic, Jennifer Scharinger, Sabine Steiner, Alija Suljic
